attributes.action: Urge all MP's to vote against new and sudden legislation to hide MP Expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am all for transparency in Government and am appalled at the draft legislation to hide MP expenses, contary to the High Court ruling on Freedom of Information and requiring MP's to publish their expenses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
